history.proof: intros H. destruct H as [x Hx]. qsimpl time: 1 use: own_multiple,divides_0_inv. rewrite Nat.succ_wd in Hx. qsimpl time: 1 use: own_multiple,divides_0_inv,mult_is_one. destruct Hx as [Hp1 _]. auto.

exceptions.tactic: assert (H1: x = 1) by (apply own_multiple in Hx; destruct Hx as [Hx0|Hx1]; [rewrite Hx0 in Hx; symmetry in Hx; apply divides_0_inv in Hx; contradiction|assumption]).
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x p : nat, x = p * x -> x = 0 \\/ p = 1" on hypothesis of type "1 = x * p".
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall p q : nat, p * q = 1 -> p = 1 /\\ q = 1" on hypothesis of type "S ?Goal0 = x * p".

original: intros H. destruct H as [x Hx]. assert (H1: x = 1) by (apply own_multiple in Hx; destruct Hx as [Hx0|Hx1]; [rewrite Hx0 in Hx; symmetry in Hx; apply divides_0_inv in Hx; contradiction|assumption]). rewrite H1 in Hx. simpl in Hx. apply mult_is_one in Hx. destruct Hx as [Hp1 _]. auto.
